attributes.background:
George ‘Johnny’ Johnson is the sole remaining member of the Dambusters raid - a pivotal operation that helped change the course of the Second World War. Despite this though, he has only ever received an MBE for his gallantry.

Let’s give this national hero the recognition he, so rightly, deserves!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
